subtitle: #Jordan is hosting the second highest share of #refugees per capita in the world. title: CLEAR Project Southampton
subtitle:
The first Universal Credit payment for new #Refugees has a minimum 35-day waiting period, meaning many new refugees are facing almost inevitable destitution, as the move-on period is just 28 days.

In the year ending September 2019, there were 34,354 asylum applications in the UK - 22% more than the previous year - 10% of the applicants were unaccompanied children.

title: JRS South Africa
